modName: Dismissal Dialogue Fix for Brelyna Maryon
summary: Fixes dismissal dialogue for Brelyna Maryon.
descriptionHtml:
Check videos section for a demonstration of the mod. It\'s pretty straight-forward.

INTRODUCTION:

This is a simple modification to Brelyna Maryon\'s dialogue response when dismissed as a follower. Primarily aimed at players who pick Brelyna as the spouse for their character, it aims to correct the often-erroneous statement that she will \"see you back at the College.\" 

As of v0.2, this plugin over-rides her default dismissal response, with a custom, more generic response. Prior to 0.2, it was conditional, based on her relationship with the player, but that resulted a monster of a bug, where Brelyna couldn\'t be dismissed at all if she\'s the player\'s spouse. Perhaps when I have time and patience to track down the issue, I\'ll make it a conditional response, again.

INSTALLATION (Manual):

 - Copy the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim installation directory ( \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\\" )
 - In the Skyrim Launcher, ensure that \"BrelynaDialogue.esp\" is selected in the Data Files menu

INSTALLTION (NNM):

 - Download and activate. 
 - In the Skyrim Launcher, ensure that \"BrelynaDialogue.esp\" is selected in the Data Files menu

OTHER NOTES:

While this mod is stand-alone, the following mods are highly recommended:

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15905]Sultry Brelyna Maryon[/url] [NOTICE: Make sure that this mod is placed BEFORE BrelynaMaryonSultry.esp in the mod load order, or the latter will not work!]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul [/url]

I cannot guarantee compatibility with any other plugins that modify voice files/data/character stats for Brelyna. In my experience, as long as this file loads BEFORE any others that modify Brelyna, there shouldn\'t be a problem.
